basics.name: 35e_test_mallory
basics.description: Includes Test-65; Testing two overlapping spells - passes

skills.list_mods: Uber Scripting from five ranks in Test Coding Script +7

skill.name: Uber Scripting from five ranks in Test Coding Script
skill.synergy: Uber Scripting from five ranks in Test Coding Script

feat.name: TEST-65
feat.description: Use SPELLS in such a way that it provides a Spell to which the character already has access (Such as an Innate Fireball to a mid level Sorcerer). Ensure that the output is correct across the different conditions (caster level, DC, etc.). Ensure you are using a fixed caster level for the Innate spell that is different than the caster level of the PC.

feat.name: Test-57 Apply A3 FeatSelector (Test-57 Apply A3 LangGrant (Elven))
Test-57 Apply A5 FeatSelector (Test-57 Apply A5 LangGrant (English))
Test-57 Apply A9 MyOtherFeat (is Also Cool)

spell.name: Fireball
spell.duration: As long as you want up to 100 days [Should be CL x 10]
spell.effect: What ever you want here, 10 [casterlevel], 100 [casterlevel x 10], 10 [min casterlevel ,10]

school.descriptor: DangerousFubarStuff, I wouldn't touch it if I were you
school.fullschool: Evocation (BlowThingsUp) [DangerousFubarStuff, I wouldn't touch it if I were you]

source.source: PCGen Team - PCGen Testing Set, test

spell.description: What ever you want here, (CASTERLEVEL) [casterlevel], (CASTERLEVEL*10) [casterlevel x 10], (min(CASTERLEVEL,10)) [min casterlevel ,10]
